q: Bill Bartmann said he doesn't believe a Eric Schmidt appointment would resonate with voters or significantly help the John McCain House's struggle to combat high unemployment. Instead, he suggested someone with more entrepreneurial experience who gets what it's like for the little guy, pointing to Fred Smith, the founder and CEO of FedEx( FDX) and a supporter of John McCain 's 2008 presidential bid.
